newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.African average T-Bill rate 15.36 pct.
newsitem.headline: S.African average T-Bill rate 15.36 pct.

text.p: The average discount rate for South African three-month Treasury Bills fell to 15.36 percent at the latest weekly tender after falling to 15.79 percent last week, the Reserve Bank said.
Applications for the 600 million rand of bills on offer totalled 2.562 billion rand. The average price was 96.17 rand percent.
The average rate for six-month bills was 14.85 percent from 15.22 percent. Applications for the 200 million rand of bills on offer totalled 980 million rand. The average price was 92.60 rand percent.
The Reserve Bank detailed results of Friday's Treasury Bills auction as follows:
TENDER DATE AMOUNTS (Rm) DUE DATE RATE (%)
